name: home-sweet-loan-app
description: Home Sweet Loan - Personal Finance Management App

scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:deploy: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules .next && cd ../backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules dist

author: Petrus Handika
